SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Animator
The Animator class represents a script component that manages animations for an entity.
AssetManager
The AssetManager class provides utility methods for loading assets such as images and audio clips.
AudioClip
The AudioClip class represents a script component that plays audio clips in the game.
BoxCollider
Represents a box collider component for detecting collisions with other entities in the game world.
Camera
The Camera class represents a camera in the game world.
CameraFollow
The CameraFollow script moves the camera to follow a target position.
Debug
The Debug class provides utility methods for debugging purposes.
DebugCameraControls
A script for controlling the camera position for debugging purposes.
Display
Manages the display window and rendering for the game.
Entity
Represents an entity in the game world.
Input
Handles input events such as key presses and mouse clicks.
LineBetween
The LineBetween script creates a line between two entities using a LineRenderer component.
LineRenderer
The LineRenderer class renders a line in the game world.
PhysicsCollisionIgnore
The PhysicsCollisionIgnore script is a flag used by the physics system to ignore collision between entities.
PlatformerController
The PlatformerController script provides control functionality for a platformer-style player character.
PlayerMovement
The PlayerMovement script handles the movement of a player-controlled entity.
Prefabs
Utility class for generating prefabricated entities commonly used in scenes.
Raycast
Provides static methods for performing raycasting in the game world.
RaycastResult
Represents the result of a raycast operation, providing information about the hit point and normal vector.
Renderer
The Renderer class is responsible for rendering entities and backgrounds onto the screen.
Rigidbody
The Rigidbody class represents a rigid body component that adds physics behavior to an entity.
Scene
Represents a scene in the game world, containing entities and background settings.
SceneManager
Manages scene transitions and scene states in the game.
SceneSwitchingButton
The SceneSwitchingButton class represents a script component used for switching scenes when clicked.
Script
The base class for scripts that can be attached to entities.
Sprite
The Sprite class represents an image used for rendering entities.
Spriterenderer
The Spriterenderer script is responsible for rendering sprites or colored rectangles on entities.
Sulfur
The Sulfur class contains configuration options and constants for the Sulfur Engine.
TextRenderer
The TextRenderer class represents a script component used for rendering text on entities.
Tilemap
The Tilemap script is responsible for generating a tilemap from provided tile data.
TopDownGroundEnemyController
The TopDownGroundEnemyController script controls the movement of a ground enemy in a top-down game.
Transform
Represents the transformation (position, scale, rotation) of an entity.
UiComponent
The UiComponent class represents a script component used for UI elements.
Vec2
Represents a 2D vector with float components.
Vec2i
Represents a 2D integer vector.
WatermarkScene
The WatermarkScene script switches the scene after a specified time interval.
